name: JDTLS LSP
description: Java language server (Eclipse JDT.LS) for Claude Code, providing code intelligence and refactoring.
longDescription: Integrates Eclipse `jdtls` (JDT Language Server) for Java files (`.java`). Provides code intelligence, refactoring, completions, and diagnostics. Requires Java 17 or later. Install via `brew install jdtls` (macOS), AUR `yay -S jdtls` (Arch), or manual download from Eclipse JDT.LS releases.
